subject: AM Brief: Tue, 31 Dec 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Norwegian Krone.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Tremblay - Emard downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Barba anser laudantium summa aetas ager apostolus aureus.
- AFR: Vespillo distinctio abduco comes quas adversus.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Follow-up: Harris - McDermott request for proposal
body:
Hi Thomas,

Hope you are well.

I'm following up on the request for proposal. We require an update by EOD next week for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Michael Jones

--
Michael Jones
Portfolio Manager
National Provident Fund
Wellington, New Zealand
